website_summaries.verdict: Although it won't work for everyone, this bristled back scratcher is a nice alternative to other models that can be harsh on bare skin.
pros: Sports a unique design that's made to be used on bare skin, thanks to the wide head with flexible bristles
Handle is hinged so you can use it straight or bent
cons: Not as effective when used over clothes
Some reports of the handle breaking after several weeks or months of use

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Thought this might be innovative, but the head is too big too simply just slip it under your collar or shirt. Also, what other people have called the perfect scratch is nothing but be kind of bristles you would find on a styling brush... A little piece of plastic with a round head. Does not really satisfy. And the fact that the handle fold in half on itself doesn't mean anything. When it folds in half you can't use the scratcher... So who cares if the design is innovative? You're better off with a $2 bamboo back scratcher from a cheap Chinese souvenir shop
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Gaskil

customer_reviews.title: It’s great as long as it lasts which is 3-4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great but is not sturdy. The first one I had broke after about 3 months. The handle broke right above the extension joint. I liked it so much I bought another one and I was determined to be careful with it. It lasted about 4 months and the brush broke off At $26 a piece I’m not going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. John Michael Haws

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good
customer_reviews.text: First back scratcher I've ever owned and I'm 60 years old. So happy to have this. I no longer have to pull my shoulder out trying to get at an itch, the handle reaches just fine. I actually wish the "teeth" were a little harder for a vigorous scratch.
customer_reviews.author: LeeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than 10 itches.
customer_reviews.text: Barely scratches an itch, handle broke very easily. Better off just using a hairbrush to scratch your back... that's essentially what this is, but probably not as good quality as your average hairbrush.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This back scratcher is the best we've ever used and we have bought some of ...
customer_reviews.text: This back scratcher is the best we've ever used and we have bought some of every kind. Cant wait to give it as gifts this upcoming season.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Brush gives a great feeling on your skin
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. Brush gives a great feeling on your skin. The Bearback is very well designed and enjoyable to use. I have never seen another backscratcher any where near the quality of this one.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Drake

customer_reviews.title: Huge Disappointment!
customer_reviews.text: The bristles on this back scratcher are soft, bendable plastic. The points on the other end of the handle are rounded and also do not do anything. Totally useless! Sent back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Laura L.

customer_reviews.title: Everybody needs one of these
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift from my son and daughter-in-law. I have dozens of those wooden back scratchers that my grandkids have either lost or use as weapons and have broken. But there is no way they are going near this one. I absolutely love it! The shape is brilliant and its by far the best back scratcher I've ever had. I use it almost every day and can't believe how good it feels. Definitely will be buying them as gifts for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Sokol

customer_reviews.title: First write-up but this does work.
customer_reviews.text: Non effective with shirt on, so unless walking around with your shirt off forget it. Cannot believe write-ups, does not work.
customer_reviews.author: james b ackley

customer_reviews.title: They break
customer_reviews.text: These are junk. I’ve bought 4 of them. Three of them are broke. They break at the first joint in the bottom handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jim H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but cannot reach parts of my back.
customer_reviews.text: My experience is very similar to that of Dr. John Michael Haws in his review; they break after 3 or 4 months. 2 of mine have broken in the same place as one of his - under the rubber handle, about one inch before it changes to just plastic. Since my bursitis keeps me from reaching my back, I am desperate for itch relief. This brush helps with the itching better than anything else I have found, even if my wife has to use it on parts of my back that I still cannot reach. I would pay double the price if the handle was longer and more curved so I could reach all of my back!
customer_reviews.author: Fred Cone

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!  Only buy it if you need a plastic hair brush that you can extend.
customer_reviews.text: This is not really for "scratching" . It is weak and does not really work. Extremely disappointed, especially after reading all the good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Aegispsyche

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: For awhile I’ve been like a bear in the woods, scratching my back on any cornered surface at home. This product is wonderful! I no longer feel like an animal when I need to scratch that area I just can’t reach. This was from my 1st order, and recently I purchased a second on for my mother, who was buying many inexpensive and useless Bear paw style back scratchers. It’s been over a week, and I’ve been hugged twice! She loves this product as much as I do!
customer_reviews.author: John McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this back scratcher due to size, color, and shape. I wanted this for my travel bag and wanted the full size and folding ability. I liked that it’s not a bathtub/shower color that’s at home. Works like it should and the curved handle makes it easy for this old, not so limber guy to reach all of my back.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Sweet relief
customer_reviews.text: This thing gets those itches at the bottom of the shoulder blades, and ACTUALLY STOPS THE ITCH FOR SOME TIME, unlike so many other scratchers that offer only momentary relief. Seems durable enough, folds for storage (have to see how the hold-open catch holds up to being opened and closed over time), adequate reach, rigid enough to work under a thick sweater, and pleasant to use.
customer_reviews.author: nuke

customer_reviews.title: CRAP!
customer_reviews.text: Once you lock the handle into place it does not unlock! It is really large and difficult to stow away. Forget about travelling with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: Second only to the wife’s fingers.
customer_reviews.text: For overall feel and performance, this is the best back scratcher I’ve ever owned. The bristles are semi-stiff and do a good job, though they could do with a tad more give. The folding handle is a nice touch. It’s a little difficult to in and out of the locked position, although I suppose that would involve some trade off in the handles rigidity when in use. All in all, just a really great, well-thought out product.
customer_reviews.author: C. E. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works well on bare skin only
customer_reviews.text: I like this scratcher but it will not work if you have a shirt on. If you try to use it with a shirt it is necessary to put too much pressure and that would break the joint in the handle. On bare skin it is amazing! Nice and wide covers a large area. Use it before you get dressed. Get a bamboo one for when you are dressed.
customer_reviews.author: David Meier

customer_reviews.title: Great back scratcher, sturdy handle.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift to a person who LOVES to have his back scratched and he loved this back scratcher! He said it hit all the right places in all the right ways. The handle clicks into place nicely and results in a sturdy extension that allows reach to the entire back from either over the shoulders or bent arm up the back. It folds nicely and can easily go in a backpack (to the gym?) or a travel bag (on vacation?). After purchase support from the company was outstanding (minor issue with scratcher handle was quickly and fully taken care of by the company). Great product, great company.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie M.

customer_reviews.title: best back scratchier i found
customer_reviews.text: I have Lichen Planus, an itchy disorder. This does not hurt your skin like finger nails could open your skin or scratch. I can't do with out this now. The business end is like a hair brush that feels good and is not sharp at all. There is only one thing to do it you suffer from itch buy and see for your self don't like it return but try and your hooked.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas K.

customer_reviews.title: Great scratch without leaving marks!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is basically a stiff hairbush on a stick, but OMG does it scratch well! You can really dig in with it without breaking skin. I even broke the lower part of the handle( my fault) and ordered another one. Now the short one is for scratching my ass and the other one is for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: Rhetorik

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good idea
customer_reviews.text: I like that it can be folded and that it just takes a snap to open to its full length, but without giving some thought or printed instructions, it is very easy to break by forcing it open too far. And I wish the usable length was a few inches longer. Aside from that it works great and I'm glad I bought it and plane to use it for many years.
customer_reviews.author: William Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: A lot of money for what you get. I’m not really sure what I thought I’d get, but for what I did get I paid a premium price.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: It saved my mom and dad's marriage (kidding)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for his birthday. He was ecstatic. I noticed that he would steal my mom's hairbrush to scratch his back, and would struggle with the hard to reach areas. My mom would scream and gag that her brush was being sullied like that. Since I bought him this, he uses it every day. I dare say it's his favorite gift. He's even got my mom using it. They say the bristles are nice and thin enough to scratch the itch, but coated at the ends so it doesn't hurt or break the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Extendable Hair Brush for Scratching your back...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, though a bit expensive for being essentially an extendable hair brush for scratching your back... Still it is a nice product that I am sure you will enjoy using!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I've seriously tried every back scratcher every made, and alway been left still itching in the middle of my back where I can't reach. Finally...someone invented this, and it works like a dream. Best back scratcher ever made! (and if you need a long handled brush because you're disabled it would work for that too)
customer_reviews.author: SSBDW

customer_reviews.title: Why did I wait so long?
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the simplest things escape us. This device is crazy neat! Design is great, why didn't I think of this? Folds down for easy storing in a suitcase, very sturdy. I think I got my moneys worth in the first 30 days. If you are considering buying one don't wait, do it now. You won't regret it, oh, and your welcome in advance.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H.

customer_reviews.title: Works just right!
customer_reviews.text: I use this back scratcher every day. The scratching head has proven to be just right. Not to stiff as some metal or hard plastic scratchers are but just flexible enough to provide a good scratch. I may need to get a second one for downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Scott vH

customer_reviews.title: Very, very effective!
customer_reviews.text: The best back Scratcher I have ever owned (I have several packed away).. Ergonomically perfect. This opens to a perfect curve to get good coverage, good grip handle. So comfortable, not scratchy, but you can feel it working. My father would have loved this back scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my better half. She has loved every penny I spent on it. It is very easy to use and folds in half if you need to travel abroad. Think hairbrush and back scratcher in one. That’s what you get. An awesome product at an unbeatable price. Do yourself and your better half a favor and get your today.
customer_reviews.author: William dalrymple

customer_reviews.title: This replaces me in a pinch!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has extremely sensitive skin, but she was thrilled with this back scratcher. She told me "it's perfect", which is a powerful statement coming from her. Nicely designed, ergonomic and the bristles are just right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this back scratcher! My wife gave me this as a gift because I was always asking her to scratch my back. Now I can scratch my own back anytime. The handle has the right shape too easily reach anywhere on my back and the wide head is so much better than those little bamboo back scratchers. I scratch my back very aggressively and so far it is holding up fine. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: C_Fontenot

customer_reviews.title: All The Single Ladies
customer_reviews.text: Definitely on the pricey side as far as back scratchers are concerned. However, the ergonomic design, coined with its flexibility, which allows this model to fold in half, this beut is a lifesaver for a single lady like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Katherine Kendrick

customer_reviews.title: Best back scratcher ever!
customer_reviews.text: I never realized how important a product like this is until I had 4 surgeries during my cancer treatment. The scar tissue is very itchy and the bear back is the perfect solution. Not only were the bristles just the right texture but with the bear back I could reach those “impossible to reach” areas! It’s a perfect gift for that someone who has everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy O'Hara

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: THe Bearback Back scratcher once expanded to get into my shirt does a great job scraching my back with out breaking the skin. l Iove it and can recommend it highly
customer_reviews.author: Ina B. Russakoff

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a back scratcher? All the same you think? NOPE! You just found the ultimate back scratcher / legs / arms / ANYWHWERE! It covers more area than any traditional one you have seen before and it conveniently folds for travel. BUY THIS ONE! I think you'll LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: D. Michaud

customer_reviews.title: A satisfying scratch for the hard to reach itch.
customer_reviews.text: This back scratcher is really just a brush with a long handle, but that works very well, especially when no one wants to scratch your back when you ask. I am completely satisfied with this product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Gruffy333

customer_reviews.title: Bareback scratcher
customer_reviews.text: Very nice when it was new but broke at handle after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: chris jarvis

customer_reviews.title: This really does the trick
customer_reviews.text: Reaches everywhere on the back and has a nice soft but effective scratcher.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect - love it
customer_reviews.text: The perfect back scratcher! Bristles are not too soft, not to hard - just right for scratching an itch. And the fact that it folds away makes it very easy to store in my bathroom closet.
customer_reviews.author: lelala

customer_reviews.title: Broke short time after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Had For a month or so and it snapped in the handle. Piece of junk as far as I’m concerned. Thought this was optimum solution given high price and looks compared to others. ISadly mistaken.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Best back scratcher I've found recently
customer_reviews.text: I am a heavy user of back scratchers and ever since the slim head, like a scalp massager, wish I had a picture, but at any rate this looks better than anything I have found since MaxScratch.com went out of business. The main thing with the Bearback is its comfort! Most backstracher are made of of metal, wood, bamboo etc and unacceptable for my thin skin, so at this point this is the best on the market I can find!
customer_reviews.author: l3aconl3oy

customer_reviews.title: Sheer perfection!
customer_reviews.text: It seems like a lot of money for “just a back scratcher.” But that’s the point. This is not just any back scratcher. It’s perfection on a foldable handle. Worth every single penny and I’m putting my money where my mouth is. Just about to order a second one for my husband so he won’t steal Mine!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: okay, but bigger than practical
customer_reviews.text: The head is just too big to fit easily under shirts, and the bristles are too blunt to scratch through a shirt.
customer_reviews.author: CF and HL

customer_reviews.title: Love the compactness
customer_reviews.text: This is our second BearBack. We received the first as a gift and have now purchased another. My favorite detail about this scratcher is that it folds up and can be neatly stored in a drawer. When in use, the full handle allows you to get to those hard to reach places. I have the lotion roller coming and cannot wait to see how that one works!
customer_reviews.author: Lindara Halloran

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced trash
customer_reviews.text: Feels super cheap, takes a ton of force to click it open/close. Save the money and attach a comb to a stick, that’s all this is
customer_reviews.author: Adam N.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hair brush with a long handle.
customer_reviews.text: Not at all good for the money. It’s basically a hair brush!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa S

customer_reviews.title: Middle of the road
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product! I just expected more out of the contact area. Its basically a really long curl comb. I wanted something that REALLY scratched my back. Its ok though.
customer_reviews.author: C.W Moore

customer_reviews.title: Hit's the SPOT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Man oh man have I been trying to reach that "spot" on my back for weeks. Finally broke down and got a back scratcher. The Bearback Back Scratcher unfolds and allows me to apply enough pressure to really get at that stubborn spot and give it a great massage and scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K. Head

customer_reviews.title: This thing couldn't scratch a lottery ticket
customer_reviews.text: They put a brush on a stick. You can just buy a hairbrush and pretty much get the same thing done.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Shumski

customer_reviews.title: Comb on a stick
customer_reviews.text: This is literally just a comb/brush on a stick. Something like this should cost only $5. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: FiendX

customer_reviews.title: Back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: Best back scratcher I’ve ever had. It is well built. Solid. Would buy again or but as present.
customer_reviews.author: Revil

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best backscratcher ever!! It is like a hairbrush! lol 😂 but it’s right next to my bed I couldn’t live without it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Got an itch?
customer_reviews.text: This will scratch it. Very pleased with it's ability to scratch that itch.... it's a bit big but worth leaving by the coach. I use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: I never Knew something this wonderful existed! Best back scratcher ever!!! Reaches all parts of your back! Wow
customer_reviews.author: Maureen t. Collins

customer_reviews.title: It works !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this back scratcher!!! This actually works without tearing up my skin. The flexible head allows one to reach every area of the back with little effort. Great product, thank you. Cathy martin
customer_reviews.author: Cathy martin

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: This is the most awesome back or anywhere scratcher that I have used. It works best on your bare skin, however, it does work through clothing. It is very well made, sturdy with a good reach. You are able to apply a good deep scratch and not injury your skin. The head is designed like a plastic hairbrush with the small knobs on the end but stiffer and not as sharp. Look no further, it's absolutely perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S. Berk

customer_reviews.title: The Best Back Scratcher Ever Made!
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for back scratching, the best I’ve used. Paid full price, so this is a heartfelt review. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: John Manzione

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now
customer_reviews.text: Best manual back scratcher ever!! The folding design is kinda weird but it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Works and very durable. Works best on bare back, no shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Rayme

customer_reviews.title: Best Back Scratcher on the Market :-)
customer_reviews.text: The future of back scratchers! This product is amazing and is, By Far, the best designed back scratcher on the market! Glad I got this and will be gifting this product to everyone that I know for Christmas 😎 10 STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: The best one I ever owned and American made what a sweet deal
customer_reviews.author: joanne Badilla

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: After surgery we couldn’t find anything to calm the itching. This product helps tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good
customer_reviews.text: Great back scatcher. Folds nicely and feels good. Although it's a little pricey it's great for those with an itchy back.
customer_reviews.author: David Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Dont be afraid of the resistance to close it as advertised, snaps right back to foldable postion.
customer_reviews.text: Full coverage, must use on bare skin to get the full desired affect... hence the name of the product. So satisfied, gave my son n law one as a gift. Feels like 5 back sratchers in 1! Love it, THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi R.

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy scratchy
customer_reviews.text: Met my expectations in quality and ease of use. Nice length as well.
customer_reviews.author: PAWF

customer_reviews.title: Not rocket science design, but still...
customer_reviews.text: Basically this is a stiff hairbrush on the end of a wand. Still, it works well and it gets used a lot.
customer_reviews.author: James Butler

customer_reviews.title: One hell of a tool! I have the urge to buy another next month for the living room.
customer_reviews.text: Dislikes? None! Best all-over body scratcher I’ve ever owned. Just as an aside, I find the company name, and especially the product name, to be intriguingly seductive & titillating. You scored a homerun, a touchdown, and a winning goal with this product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gary "Gaer" Mark Enos

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product. It’s wonderful. Gentle but does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: The best back scratcher I have ever used. Nothing else compares.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: One for Me, One for the dog
customer_reviews.text: I made the mistake of scratching my doggo with this just one time, and now I had to get another for myself because my original is covered in dog hair. Incredible. Not small enough for travel, but great to hold you over until the wifey gets her nails done. Must buy.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Humboldt

customer_reviews.title: A so-so solution
customer_reviews.text: Does not scrub or rub itch away. Just interesting . . .
customer_reviews.author: Ray G

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: It works well but it seemed like I broke it when I opened it up.
customer_reviews.author: Junie

customer_reviews.title: Good scratch without damaging the skin
customer_reviews.text: Some of the other reviews complained that the scratch was not hard enough, but I think it's perfect. It's a good scratch, but it never damages or breaks the skin. I'm using it not only on my back where I could not reach, but also anywhere I itch, because scratching with my fingernails can leave marks or even break the skin.
customer_reviews.author: 2cdneh

customer_reviews.title: Back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Easy to use. Now my cat it. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best back scratcher I've owned
customer_reviews.text: This is a nifty little item. It's way better than any other back scratcher I've had, and it feels good. I would definitely recommend this to anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Collins

customer_reviews.title: Itch be gone!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best back scratcher I’ve ever owned. It’s perfect for self use or to use on others for getting that itch.
customer_reviews.author: Bommli

customer_reviews.title: The best one
customer_reviews.text: This is the best back scratcher I have encountered. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: septagon

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: It really scratches with just the right pressure. Not too soft and too hard. It’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Etta S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Bearback for my husband. We love it! Now I think I’ll buy another one for me! Ann-attorney
customer_reviews.author: The Dennens

customer_reviews.title: Five star product!
customer_reviews.text: This back scratcher is the gold medal of all back scratchers, an “itchy back’s” dream. The BearBack back scratcher would be a great product/gift/stocking stuffer for anyone who’s looking for a unique and well made product. It’s portable-friendly for packing and real easy to use. Super happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: moviegirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for hard to reach itching
customer_reviews.text: This was was gift for my partner who is chronically itchy - he says it's the first scratcher that actually works. Like an angry porcupine on a stick.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Allen

customer_reviews.title: Not your average back scratcher.
customer_reviews.text: I think this back scratcher feels really good. Basically like scratching my back with a brush.However, whenever I go to fold it back up, the snapping sound it makes when it collapses back to it's folded form, sounds like I'm breaking it. That's probably not the case but I'm almost afraid I will break it to some extent. Great idea though.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie McNabb

customer_reviews.title: The last one you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new bear back back scratcher!! It’s easy to hold and use. It also relaxes my muscles. I know I will be taking it with me when I travel. I’m thinking about buying more for Christmas presents. I know my family would love it as much as I do.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Walters

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works for me, just need a strong person to use it on you so it can make you bleed from the scratching to really get that itch. (Or is that just me?)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Alyse Crislip

customer_reviews.title: Great Compact Back Scratcher
customer_reviews.text: This back scratcher works wonders. It is compact and lightweight. It folds up so you can bring it anywhere with you and it is very sturdy. I would definitely recommend this backscratcher.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Jubinville

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Back Scratcher!
customer_reviews.text: Best Back Scratcher I've ever used! Intuitive design that folds up easily for travel or to store in a drawer. Easy to use and reaches your whole back! I also like the new Black color! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Chris v.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This back scratcher is different from the other metal pullout ones. Very sturdy and my back loves the bristles. Also fordable.
customer_reviews.author: JPett

customer_reviews.title: omg
customer_reviews.text: my husband loves this backscratcher! he said it's the best purchase he has made on amazon. he is very picky and has dry skin so this one always hits the spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bear Back
customer_reviews.text: Best back scratcher ever. It's long and wide enough to get every spot. You can collapse it for travel. It's sharp but not enough sharp to harm you in anyway. I say that because I have my wife scratch my back and her nails ain't long enough or sharp enough to get the job done. This product it amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just buy a hair brush and tape it to a stick
customer_reviews.text: POS, doesn’t really scratch, it’s a comb on a stick, would be better at brushing hair then scratching a hard to reach spot on your back
customer_reviews.author: frank piazza

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic back scratcher
customer_reviews.text: My husband says we can throw away all the other back scratchers we have in the house because nothing else compares to the "bearback," it feels wonderful and does the job of getting to the itch.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: BEST BACK SCRATCHER EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t recommend this product enough!!! Well worth the extra bucks!! SIMPLY OUTSTANDING!!!!!...
customer_reviews.author: DManDzinr

customer_reviews.title: Reach areas other back scratchers can’t.
customer_reviews.text: Functional, durable product worth its price. Easy to use, easy to clean, versatile and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Argast

customer_reviews.title: Good features, but comes up short
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to open/ close. Basically an extended hair brush. Doesn't really "scratch the itch". - metaphorically or literally.
customer_reviews.author: ryan bareilles

customer_reviews.title: Gets in there!
customer_reviews.text: This is sturdier than those telescopic metal hand shaped ones. The bristles are like a brush bristle really good for scratching. The other end is great for targeting a specific itch. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Lars Frantzen

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: Ergonomically the product is perfect & it's also built to last. It's long enough to reach your entire back (I'm a large man) & works great! I just wish the individual 'teeth' of the brush/back scratcher were stiffer.
customer_reviews.author: bros

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I have tried different back scratchers but none of them felt as good as this one. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Probert

customer_reviews.title: TERRIFIC PRODUCT...IT WORKS
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and like it so much I got my daughter one for Christmas. Easy on the skin and reaches with ease the itchy back. Can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a great price. A friend recommended it and it is great beyond my expectations. Quick shipment from the inventor along with his contact info. You can’t go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Joe Butler

product_meta.title: Bearback Back Scratcher: #1 Best-Selling Premium Back & Body Scratcher. The Original Large Bristled Folding Scratcher. Superior Quality Skin Invigorating Brush. A Uniquely Better Scratching Experience
feature_bullets: Safe for sensitive skin. If you have itchy skin due to a medical issue - or simply enjoy the sensation of being scratched, the bearback is for you. The 4.5" bristled scratching head is tough on itches and gentle on your skin.
The bearback delivers skin-invigorating bliss along with the benefits of exfoliation and improved circulation.

Thoughtful and elegant design. The folding handle extends to 17" so you can easily reach any itch. The ergonomic curve enables you to apply the perfect amount of pressure. The comfortable non-slip grip feels great in your hand. The pliable bristles feel wonderful all over and are gentle enough for the most sensitive skin.
The bearback is designed for use on your bare skin. Enjoy it on your back, arms, legs...wherever you need relief!
Lifetime warranty. If you ever have an issue due to materials or workmanship, we'll replace it!
